Author: babybighorn
Text: that may be a good idea, can't fix my arms but maybe i can squeeze my midsection more.

Author: lasirenexx
Text: I’m sure your friend and seamstress are right that you look amazing, but have you considered wearing shapewear underneath your wedding gown? My husband & I eloped, but had a little ceremony with a wedding photographer, and I wanted to be sure I’d love the photos, so I wore a waist trainer underneath my wedding gown. It made my dress so much more flattering & helped me feel more confident.
